name: Trivia Night
description: Test your knowledge at our fun trivia night! Bring your friends and form a team to compete for prizes.

name: Dodgeball Tournament
description: Join our dodgeball tournament for a fast-paced and exciting competition between student teams. May the best dodgers win!

name: Karaoke Party
description: Show off your singing skills at our lively karaoke party! Grab the mic and sing your heart out with friends.

name: Mini Golf Madness
description: Play a round of mini golf with friends old and new! Enjoy some friendly competition at the mini golf course.

name: International Food Fair
description: Sample dishes from around the world at our international food fair. Expand your culinary horizons with exotic flavors.

name: Scavenger Hunt
description: Embark on an exciting scavenger hunt across campus and win prizes! Form teams and put your heads together to crack clues.

name: Open Mic Night
description: Perform your stand-up, poetry, songs, or comedy act at our open mic night! Sign up and show off your talents.

name: Capture the Flag
description: Play this classic game under the stars on the quad! Strategy, speed and teamwork will lead your team to victory.

name: Masquerade Ball
description: Attend our lavish masquerade ball in masks and costumes for a night of mystery and intrigue. Dance the night away with friends.

name: Carnival Extravaganza
description: Play carnival games, eat classic treats, and have fun at our colorful carnival! Win prizes at booths and shows.

name: Talent Show
description: Cheer on your talented peers at our talent show! Singing, dancing, magic - anything goes on our stage.

name: Bonfire Bash
description: Join us around a crackling bonfire for s'mores, stories, and stargazing. Bring blankets for a cozy night of camping under the stars.

name: Dance Party
description: Dance the night away with friends at our exciting dance party with a live DJ! Show off your best moves to top hits.

name: Skating Soiree
description: Lace up your skates for an evening of fun at our retro rollerskating soiree! Skate to hits and make memories.

name: Bowling Bonanza
description: Knock down pins and bond with friends old and new at our bowling bonanza. With music, snacks and colorful lights!

name: Picnic in the Park
description: Enjoy tasty treats and refreshing drinks at our breezy picnic in the park! Bring blankets and games to this green get-together.

name: Snow Day Celebration
description: Get into the winter spirit at our snow day celebration with hot cocoa, sledding and snowmen! Bundle up and come play in the snow.

name: Hiking Adventure
description: Explore nature on our scenic hiking adventure! Follow trails through forests and peaks surrounding our campus.

name: Yoga in the Lounge
description: Do sun salutations in the lounge at our yoga session for students. Stretch out with friends at this rejuvenating event.

name: Ice Skating Soiree
description: Glide across the ice holding hands with friends at our winter wonderland ice skating soiree. Hot chocolate wait afterward!

name: Amusement Park Trip
description: Scream on rollercoasters and win giant plushies at our exciting amusement park trip! Make magical memories with friends new and old.

name: Camping Getaway
description: Roast marshmallows and sleep under the stars on our weekend camping getaway. Bond with nature and new friends in the great outdoors.

name: Superhero Photo Booth
description: Strike heroic poses at our superhero themed photo booth! Dress up, ham it up, and take home pics with friends.

name: Puppy Playdate
description: Destress and get your puppy fix at our puppy playdate! These furry friends bring joy and comfort to students.

name: Basketball Bonanza
description: Dribble, pass, and shoot hoops at our 3-on-3 basketball tournament! Assemble your best players and go for the win.

name: Sandcastle Contest
description: Show off your sculpting skills in our sandcastle contest at the beach! Build the most creative castle and win prizes.

name: Board Game Night
description: Break out the classics for a night of checkers, chess, Monopoly and more! Snacks, drinks and friendly competition provided.

name: Limbo Competition
description: How low can you go? Find out at our fun limbo competition! See who can shimmy under the bar to triumph.

name: Holiday Bazaar
description: Get into the holiday spirit at our festive bazaar! Shop gifts by student artisans and enjoy music and treats.

name: Pumpkin Carving Party
description: Carve creative jack-o-lanterns at our pumpkin carving party! Roast pumpkin seeds and display your work.

name: Paintball Panthers
description: Join the Paintball Panthers for an action-packed day running, dodging and diving! Victory goes to the stealthiest team.

name: Bungee Run
description: Take a wild ride on our massive bungee run! Strap in and get launched skyward for an adrenaline rush.

name: Game Day Tailgate
description: Fire up the grill for burgers and dogs at our game day tailgate party! Eat, socialize and cheer on our team.

name: Scary Movie Marathon
description: Grab a blanket and join us for a marathon of classic horror movies. Don't watch alone - bring friends for scares and laughs!

name: Arts and Crafts Festival
description: Get creative at our arts and crafts festival! Make tie dye shirts, picture frames, candles, and other DIY projects.

name: Water Balloon Fight
description: Dodge and throw water balloons across the quad at our fun water balloon fight! Get soaked and cool down on a hot day.

name: Taco Tuesday
description: Celebrate Taco Tuesday with our taco buffet! Enjoy walking tacos, nachos and more with friends.

name: Karaoke Contest
description: Show off your pipes at our karaoke contest! Perform your favorite hits and wow judges for a chance to win big.

name: 3-Point Shootout
description: Swish shot after shot in our basketball 3-point shootout! Shoot your way through heats and compete for the top score.

name: Obstacle Course
description: Test your speed and agility on our challenging obstacle course! Climb walls, crawl through tunnels and more in a race to the finish.

name: Fashion Show
description: Strut your stuff on the runway at our fashion show featuring student designers' clothing lines! Dress to impress and cheer on models.

name: Haunted House
description: Brave the thrills and chills of our spooky haunted house if you dare! Twist and turn through dark corridors filled with ghosts and ghouls.

name: Surf Club Beach Day
description: Catch a wave with the surf club at beach day! Grab a board and hang ten with friends new and old.

name: Disney Dance Party
description: Relive your childhood at our magical disney dance party! Dress as your favorite character and dance to disney hits.

name: Coffee House Night
description: Enjoy an evening of live music at our cozy coffee house night in the student union. Play an open mic or just sit back with coffee and friends.

name: Coffee House Night
description: Enjoy an evening of live music at our cozy coffee house night in the student union. Play an open mic or just sit back with coffee and friends.

name: 3-Legged Race
description: Tie your leg to a partner and race to the finish in this silly 3-legged race! Match your stride as you run together.

name: Tie-Dye Party
description: Unleash your creativity with colorful tie-dye at our groovy tie-dye party! Make shirts, socks, bandanas and other accessories.

name: Pajama Party Movie Night
description: Snuggle up in pajamas for a cozy movie night with friends! Bring your favoriteBlankets, pillows and snacks provided.

name: Ping Pong Tournament
description: Smash the ball back and forth in our intense ping pong tournament! Train and compete to become the ping pong champ.

name: Silent Disco
description: Dance to music through headphones at our psychedelic silent disco party! Choose between competing DJs via different channels.

name: Carnival Night
description: Step right up to play carnival games and win prizes! Try your hand at ring toss, milk bottle toss, balloon darts and more.

name: Karaoke Contest
description: Grab the microphone and belt out tunes at our karaoke contest! Impress judges and compete to win.

name: Foam Party
description: Get soaked in bubbles and foam at our wild foam party! Dance and play in mountains of fluffy foam.

name: Cook-Off Challenge
description: Whip up your most delicious dish at our cook-off challenge! Impress celebrity chef judges and take home the prize.

name: Pumpkin Patch
description: Pick the perfect pumpkin at our pumpkin patch! Take hayrides, enjoy apple cider and explore the patch with friends.

name: Hiking Club Overnight
description: Sleep under the stars on an overnight hiking trip with the hiking club. Bond over campfires, stargazing and challenging trails.

name: Yoga and Smoothies
description: Find your zen at yoga and smoothies! Stretch out tired muscles and refuel with refreshing smoothies.

name: Jousting Tournament
description: Grab a pool noodle and joust on the quad at our medieval jousting tournament! Knock friends off their "horses" to win.

name: Water Olympics
description: Compete in wacky games like water balloon toss, slip n slide races and more at our Water Olympics! Get ready to get wet.

name: Laser Tag
description: Evade and tag opponents with lasers at our exciting laser tag game night! Form teams and strategize your way to victory.

name: Meme Party
description: Dress up as your favorite meme or viral sensation at our meme-themed costume party! Compare memes and make viral memories.

name: Open Mic Comedy
description: Tell jokes, perform sketches and be hilarious at our open mic comedy night! Try out material or just enjoy laughs from rising comics.

name: Ice Cream Social
description: Make your own sundaes with unlimited toppings at our ice cream social! Chat with friends over this sweet, chilled treat.

name: Holi Festival
description: Get covered in vibrant powders at our Indian Holi festival celebration! Dance, laugh and get colorful with friends.

name: Coffee and Donuts
description: Fuel up with piping hot coffee and sugary donuts at this morning meetup! The perfect study or social break.

name: Slip and Slide Kickball
description: Get wet and wild playing kickball on a giant slippery slip n slide! Slide to bases in this amped up classic.
